name: 3 Guys
description:
Three Guys is a puzzle game involving Three Guys: Red, Yellow, and Green. Red is feeling hungry, so he recruits two of his pals to help him look for diamonds, for lunch. Along the way, the Guys will need to use their skills to build bridges, push blocks, avoid traps, find keys to open doors, use teleporters, dodge lasers, and all sort of other things. The game features 100 levels of brain-teasing puzzles.

The source code for this game is available on GitHub:

https://github.com/stephenjsweeney/3Guys

(screenshots taken from Android version - desktop port is largely identical).
